title: Can you give an example of a link between art and science? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure. There are plenty of them. Data artists, for instance, like to work with scientific data to generate their imagery: Redirect Notice Andrea Polli creates very interesting real-time data based eco artworks like this one in Pittsburgh that creates a visual representation of air quality. Pittsburgh Art Places This is a friend of mine whose work is inspired by microscopic imagery and natural environments: Lea Anderson British photographer Nick Veasey creates his imagery with X-rays. nickveasey

Very, very simple both are sometime pure serindipitous. They both require extreme attention to what is not always obvious but always in your face. It’s often as the say in French “ little death” “e petite Mort” an explosion of visual awareness as to what was obviously in front of you.
